mapper.update:
update yo_item_change
ic_approve_no = #{icApproveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_title = #{icTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_approve_state = #{icApproveState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_approve_result = #{icApproveResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_approve_begin = #{icApproveBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_approve_end = #{icApproveEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_ask_staff_id = #{icAskStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_ask_staff_name = #{icAskStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_ask_staff_depart = #{icAskStaffDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_history_approve_name = #{icHistoryApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_approve_record = #{icApproveRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_now_approve_name = #{icNowApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_cost = #{icCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_change_item = #{icChangeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_change_order = #{icChangeOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_business_property = #{icBusinessProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_change_province = #{icChangeProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_work_city = #{icWorkCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_department = #{icDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_outroom_work = #{icOutroomWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ic_effect_date = #{icEffectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ic_sequence_no = #{icSequenceNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yo_item_change set ic_approve_no = #{icApproveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_title = #{icTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_approve_state = #{icApproveState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_approve_result = #{icApproveResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_approve_begin = #{icApproveBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_approve_end = #{icApproveEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_ask_staff_id = #{icAskStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_ask_staff_name = #{icAskStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_ask_staff_depart = #{icAskStaffDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_history_approve_name = #{icHistoryApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_approve_record = #{icApproveRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_now_approve_name = #{icNowApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_cost = #{icCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_change_item = #{icChangeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_change_order = #{icChangeOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_business_property = #{icBusinessProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_change_province = #{icChangeProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_work_city = #{icWorkCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_department = #{icDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_outroom_work = #{icOutroomWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ic_effect_date = #{icEffectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ic_sequence_no = #{icSequenceNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from yo_item_change
ic_ask_staff_name like CONCAT('%','${icAskStaffName}','%')
and ic_ask_staff_id = '${icAskStaffId}'
and ic_ask_staff_depart like CONCAT('%','${icAskStaffDepart}','%')
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) <= DATE_FORMAT(ic_approve_begin,"%Y-%m-%d")
and DATE_FORMAT(ic_approve_begin,"%Y-%m-%d") >= '${icApproveBegin}' and DATE_FORMAT(ic_approve_begin,"%Y-%m-%d") <= '${icApproveEnd}'
mapper.insert: insert into yo_item_change ic_sequence_no, ic_approve_no, ic_title, ic_approve_state, ic_approve_result, ic_approve_begin, ic_approve_end, ic_ask_staff_id, ic_ask_staff_name, ic_ask_staff_depart, ic_history_approve_name, ic_approve_record, ic_now_approve_name, ic_cost, ic_change_item, ic_change_order, ic_business_property, ic_change_province, ic_work_city, ic_department, ic_outroom_work, ic_effect_date) values ( #{icApproveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icApproveState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icApproveResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icApproveBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icApproveEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icAskStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icAskStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icAskStaffDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icHistoryApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icApproveRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icNowApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icChangeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icChangeOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icBusinessProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icChangeProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icWorkCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icOutroomWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icEffectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
